definition: Di[3-deoxy-D-manno-octulosonyl]-lipid A + Undecaprenyl phosphate alpha-L-Ara4N <=> alpha-Kdo-(2->4)-alpha-Kdo-(2->6)-[4-P-L-Ara4N]-lipid A + di-trans,poly-cis-Undecaprenyl phosphate
name: 4-amino-4-deoxy-alpha-L-arabinopyranosyl ditrans,octacis-undecaprenyl phosphate:KDO2-lipid A 4-amino-4-deoxy-alpha-L-arabinopyranosyltransferase
